languages.text: "Смертоносные духи проступили в реальности более ясно, и теперь все видят, что они не танцуют — они сражаются! Бьются и шепчут два имени — Халкион и Кессей".
"The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."
languages.original_text: "Смертоносные духи проступили в реальности более ясно, и теперь все видят, что они не танцуют — они сражаются! Бьются и шепчут два имени — Халкион и Кессей".

traits.locale_text: "The deadly spirits have become more clear in the reality, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names —Halkyon and Kessey."
"The deadly spirits have become more clear in the reality, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names —Halkyon and Kessey."
"The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."
"The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."
"The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."
"The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."

languages.text: “那些致命的幽灵变得更清晰了。现在都有人都能看到，他们并不是在跳舞，而是在战斗！他们在战斗的时候还呼喊着两个名字，‘哈西恩’和‘凯塞’。”
languages.original_text: "The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."

traits.locale_text: “那些致命的幽灵变得更清晰了。现在都有人都能看到，他们并不是在跳舞，而是在战斗！他们在战斗的时候还呼喊着两个名字，‘哈西恩’和‘凯塞’。”

languages.text: «Los espíritus mortales se han vuelto más tangibles, y ahora todo el mundo puede ver que no están bailando, ¡están luchando! Luchando y coreando dos nombres, Halchyon y Kessei».
languages.original_text: "The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."

traits.locale_text: «Los espíritus mortales se han vuelto más tangibles, y ahora todo el mundo puede ver que no están bailando, ¡están luchando! Luchando y coreando dos nombres, Halchyon y Kessei».

languages.text: 「恐ろしい精霊たちは次第に物質的な形態になり、今では誰もが、彼らは舞ってはおらず...戦っていると分かるようになりました！ハルシオンとケッセイという2つの名前を唱えながら...戦っています」
languages.original_text: "The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."

traits.locale_text: 「恐ろしい精霊たちは次第に物質的な形態になり、今では誰もが、彼らは舞ってはおらず...戦っていると分かるようになりました！ハルシオンとケッセイという2つの名前を唱えながら...戦っています」

languages.text: « L'apparence des esprits belliqueux est progressivement devenue plus tangible, et il apparaît maintenant qu'ils ne s'abandonnent pas à une danse fiévreuse, mais qu'ils livrent bataille ! Ils s'affrontent en scandant deux noms : Halchyon et Kessei. »
languages.original_text: "The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."

traits.locale_text: « L'apparence des esprits belliqueux est progressivement devenue plus tangible, et il apparaît maintenant qu'ils ne s'abandonnent pas à une danse fiévreuse, mais qu'ils livrent bataille ! Ils s'affrontent en scandant deux noms : Halchyon et Kessei. »

languages.text: "Die tödlichen Geister sind materieller geworden, und nun kann jeder sehen, dass sie nicht tanzen — sie kämpfen! Sie kämpfen und singen zwei Namen — Halchyon und Kessei."
languages.original_text: "The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."

traits.locale_text: "Die tödlichen Geister sind materieller geworden, und nun kann jeder sehen, dass sie nicht tanzen — sie kämpfen! Sie kämpfen und singen zwei Namen — Halchyon und Kessei."

languages.text: "Ölümcül ruhlar daha da somutlaştı. Dans etmediklerini artık herkes görebiliyor. Ruhlar dövüşüyor! Dövüşürken de iki ismi haykırıyorlar: Halchyon ve Kessei."
languages.original_text: "The deadly spirits have become more material, and now everyone can see that they are not dancing — they are fighting! Fighting and chanting two names — Halchyon and Kessei."
